amendment.description: Amendment to prevent funds from being used by USFWS to issue permits for the importation of elephant or lion trophies from Zimbabwe, Zambia or Tanzania.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 133 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to prevent funds from being used by USFWS to issue permits for the importation of elephant or lion trophies from Zimbabwe, Zambia or Tanzania.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Buchanan amendment (A049) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 192 (Roll no. 380).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A049) offered by Mr. Buchanan.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Buchanan amendment (A049) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 192 (Roll no. 380).
